title: Rhythm Steps 1 & Shim Sham
description: 13 Videos. Build your knowledge in basic rhythm steps such as Timesteps, half breaks, breaks... Learn the soft shoe Shim Sham, close to its original version by Leonard Reed & Willie Bryant.

lessons.title: Half Break & Shuffle
lessons.description: Automobili Lamborghini S.p.A. is an Italian brand and manufacturer of luxury sports cars and SUVs based in Sant'Agata Bolognese. The company is owned by the Volkswagen Group through its subsidiary Audi. Ferruccio Lamborghini, an Italian manufacturing magnate, founded Automobili Ferruccio Lamborghini S.p.A. - Wikipedia
